name: Hollow Radiance
simpleDescription: Immobilize enemies to gain a shield. Activate to run faster at opponents.

passives.name: Immolate
passives.effects: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal {{as|{{#vardefineecho:hollow_ibase|15}} {{as|(+ {{#vardefineecho:hollow_ihp|1}}% '''bonus''' health)}} magic damage|magic damage}} every second to enemies within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 325 (+ 100% '''bonus''' size) units, with the damage being increased to 125% against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.

passives.name: Desolate
passives.effects: Killing a {{tt|non-champion unit|Excluding wards and structures.}} causes an eruption around their death location that deals{{ft|{{as|{{ap|{{#var:hollow_ibase}}*2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:hollow_ihp}}*2}}% '''bonus''' health)}} magic damage|magic damage}}|200% of ''Immolate's'' damage}}to enemies within 350 units. Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them causes a larger eruption that deals{{ft|{{as|{{ap|{{#var:hollow_ibase}}*4}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:hollow_ihp}}*4}}% '''bonus''' health)}} magic damage|magic damage}}|400% of ''Immolate's'' damage}}to enemies within 500 units.
